```{r}
#| label: setup

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(broom)
library(sf)
library(here)
library(caret)        # 10-fold CV
library(car)          # VIF
library(lmtest)       # BP test
library(sandwich)     # robust vcov
library(tigris)       # 2020 tracts + places
options(tigris_use_cache = TRUE, tigris_year = 2020)

set.seed(5080)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)
```

```{r}
#| label: load-data

housing <- readr::read_csv(here("data/boston.csv")) |> clean_names()


tract_map_raw <- readr::read_csv(here("data/boston_neighborhood_boundaries_approximated_by_2020_census_tracts.csv")) |> 
  clean_names()

glimpse(housing)
glimpse(tract_map_raw)

```
